tool.name: pyext
tool.summary: Sets construction variables for a python C extension builder
tool.sets: PYEXTCC PYEXTCCCOM PYEXTCCCOMSTR PYEXTCFLAGS PYEXTCCSHARED PYEXTLINK PYEXTLINKCOM PYEXTLINKCOMSTR PYEXTLINKFLAGS PYEXTSUFFIX PYEXTPREFIX PYEXTINCPATH PYEXTCPPPATH PYEXTOBJSUFFIX PYEXTOBJPREFIX PYEXT_ALLOW_UNDEFINED

cvar.name: PYEXTCC
cvar.summary: The C compiler use to compile extensions object from source files.

cvar.name: PYEXTCCCOM
cvar.summary: The comand line used to build python object.

cvar.name: PYEXTCFLAGS
cvar.summary: General options passed to the C compiler when building python extensions.

cvar.name: PYEXTCCSHARED
cvar.summary: Flag to build python extensions intended to be loaded dynamically (e.g. -fPIC on gnu, etc...)

cvar.name: PYEXTLINK
cvar.summary: Linker used to build python extensions.

cvar.name: PYEXTLINKCOM
cvar.summary: Linker command used to build python extensions.

cvar.name: PYEXTINCPATH
cvar.summary: Path where to look for the Python.h header file (e.g. /usr/include/python2.5 on a standard Linux install for python 2.5)

cvar.name: PYEXTSUFFIX
cvar.summary: File extension for python extensions. Same as SHLIBSUFFIX by default if distutils is not used.

cvar.name: PYEXTOBJSUFFIX
cvar.summary: File extension for compiled python extensions source files.
